trans-unit.source: Indicates the priority that the system associates with a process.
trans-unit.target: 指示系统将与进程关联的优先级。

trans-unit.source: This value, together with the priority value of each thread of the process, determines each thread's base priority level.
trans-unit.target: 此值与进程的每个线程的优先级值一起来确定每个线程的基本优先级别。

trans-unit.source: A process priority class encompasses a range of thread priority levels.
trans-unit.target: 进程优先级类包含一系列线程优先级级别。

trans-unit.source: Threads with different priorities running in the process run relative to the process's priority class.
trans-unit.target: 具有不同优先级的进程中运行的线程运行相对于进程的优先级类。

trans-unit.source: The operating system uses the base-priority level of all executable threads to determine which thread gets the next slice of processor time.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统使用所有可执行的线程的基本的优先级来确定哪个线程获取下一个切片的处理器时间。

trans-unit.source: Win32 uses four priority classes with seven base priority levels per class.
trans-unit.target: Win32 了七个基本优先级级别，每个类使用四个优先级类。

trans-unit.source: Based on time elapsed or other boosts, the operating system can change the base priority level when a process needs to be put ahead of others for access to the processor.
trans-unit.target: 基于运行时间或其他提升，操作系统才可以时的进程需要其他出于放访问到处理器的基本优先级级别进行更改的时间。

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can set <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityBoostEnabled%2A> to temporarily boost the priority level of threads that have been taken out of the wait state.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你可以设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityBoostEnabled%2A>以暂时提升离开等待状态的线程的优先级。

trans-unit.source: The priority is reset when the process returns to the wait state.
trans-unit.target: 当过程返回到等待状态时，将重置优先级。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the process has priority above <see langword="Normal" /> but below <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass.High" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定进程的优先级在 <see langword="Normal" /> 之上，但在 <see cref="F:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass.High" /> 之下。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the process has priority above <see langword="Idle" /> but below <see langword="Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定进程的优先级在 <see langword="Idle" /> 之上，但在 <see langword="Normal" /> 之下。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the process performs time-critical tasks that must be executed immediately, such as the <see langword="Task List" /> dialog, which must respond quickly when called by the user, regardless of the load on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 指定进程执行必须立即执行的时间关键任务，如 <see langword="Task List" /> 对话框，不管操作系统的负荷如何，用户调用该对话框后均必须迅速响应。

trans-unit.source: The threads of the process preempt the threads of normal or idle priority class processes.
trans-unit.target: 该进程的线程优先于普通或空闲优先级类进程的线程。

trans-unit.source: Use extreme care when specifying `High` for the process's priority class, because a high priority class application can use nearly all available processor time.
trans-unit.target: 指定时使用格外小心`High`进程的优先级类，因为高优先级类应用程序可以使用几乎所有可用的处理器时间。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the threads of this process run only when the system is idle, such as a screen saver.
trans-unit.target: 指定此进程的线程只能在系统空闲时运行，如屏幕保护程序。

trans-unit.source: The threads of the process are preempted by the threads of any process running in a higher priority class.
trans-unit.target: 更高优先级类中运行的任何进程的线程都优先于此进程的线程。

trans-unit.source: The idle priority class is inherited by child processes.
trans-unit.target: 由子进程继承的空闲优先级类。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the process has no special scheduling needs.
trans-unit.target: 指定进程没有特殊的安排需求。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the process has the highest possible priority.
trans-unit.target: 指定进程拥有可能的最高优先级。

trans-unit.source: The threads of a process with `RealTime` priority preempt the threads of all other processes, including operating system processes performing important tasks.
trans-unit.target: 与进程的线程`RealTime`优先级的线程优先于所有其他进程，包括操作系统进程执行重要任务。

trans-unit.source: Thus, a `RealTime` priority process that executes for more than a very brief interval can cause disk caches not to flush or cause the mouse to be unresponsive.
trans-unit.target: 因此，`RealTime`优先级进程执行的更多数量非常短暂的间隔可能会导致磁盘缓存不刷新，或导致鼠标无响应。
